about.description: PoreSpy is a collection of image analysis tool used to extract information from 3D images of porous materials (typically obtained from X-ray tomography). There are many packages that offer generalized image analysis tools (i.e Skimage and Scipy.NDimage in the Python environment, ImageJ, MatLab's Image Processing Toolbox), but the all require building up complex scripts or macros to accomplish tasks of specific use to porous media. The aim of PoreSpy is to provide a set of pre-written tools for all the common porous media measurements.
about.summary: A set of tools for characterizing and analying 3D images of porous materials

name: porespy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "porespy" %}
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7dea5e903792a83e49c10e180f10493645a7c4112141816e291d09201ce2aa52

build:
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - scikit-image
    - matplotlib-base
    - pandas
    - imageio
    - pyevtk
    - array_split
    - transforms3d
    - tqdm
    - numba
    - "dask[complete]"
    - openpnm
    - edt

test:
  imports:
    - porespy

about:
  home: https://github.com/PMEAL/porespy/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A set of tools for characterizing and analying 3D images of porous materials'
  description: PoreSpy is a collection of image analysis tool used to extract
      information from 3D images of porous materials (typically obtained from
      X-ray tomography). There are many packages that offer generalized image
      analysis tools (i.e Skimage and Scipy.NDimage in the Python environment,
      ImageJ, MatLab's Image Processing Toolbox), but the all require building
      up complex scripts or macros to accomplish tasks of specific use to
      porous media. The aim of PoreSpy is to provide a set of pre-written tools
      for all the common porous media measurements.

  doc_url: https://porespy.readthedocs.io/en/master/
  dev_url: https://github.com/PMEAL/porespy/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jgostick
    - ma-sadeghi
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
